definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcitems"><value name="a"><block type="entity_iteminhand"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Matches</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="block_nbt_logic_set" inline="false"><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">hasfire</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="entity_lookpos_x"><field name="fluid_mode">ANY</field><field name="block_mode">COLLIDER</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="entity_lookpos_y"><field name="fluid_mode">ANY</field><field name="block_mode">COLLIDER</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="entity_lookpos_z"><field name="fluid_mode">ANY</field><field name="block_mode">COLLIDER</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="maxdistance"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></value><value name="tagValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="call_procedure_at"><field name="procedure">Randombuildingfire</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
